channel.title: Google Gemini on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Google Gemini on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 10 Crazy Features Powering Google's Pixel 10 Phones (and Watch)
item.description: Google’s latest AI features include real-time translated phone calls in your own AI-generated voice, an AI camera coach that makes you a better Instagram husband, and a voicemail replacement.

item.title: 10 Crazy Features Powering Google's Pixel 10 Phones (and Watch)
item.description: Google’s latest AI features include real-time translated phone calls in your own AI-generated voice, an AI camera coach that makes you a better Instagram husband, and a voicemail replacement.

item.title: Exclusive: Google Pixel Watch 4 Teardown Shows Easy Repairability
item.description: Watch our exclusive teardown of the Pixel Watch 4 to see just how easy it is to remove the battery and display on Google’s latest smartwatch.

item.title: Exclusive: Google Pixel Watch 4 Teardown Shows Easy Repairability
item.description: Watch our exclusive teardown of the Pixel Watch 4 to see just how easy it is to remove the battery and display on Google’s latest smartwatch.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Watch 4, Pixel Buds 2a: Specs, Features, Release Date
item.description: The Pixel 10 series is here. These are the first official flagship Android phones with magnetic Qi2 wireless charging. Also in tow are the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a earbuds.

item.title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Watch 4, Pixel Buds 2a: Specs, Features, Release Date
item.description: The Pixel 10 series is here. These are the first official flagship Android phones with magnetic Qi2 wireless charging. Also in tow are the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a earbuds.

item.title: Google Gemini will now learn from your chats—unless you tell it not to
item.description: Gemini will remember this, so it’s time to check your privacy settings.

item.title: Google Gemini struggles to write code, calls itself “a disgrace to my species”
item.description: Google still trying to fix “annoying infinite looping bug,” product manager says.

item.title: Researchers design “promptware” attack with Google Calendar to turn Gemini evil
item.description: The team behind the research has worked with Google to mitigate the attack, but what comes next?

item.title: Hackers Hijacked Google’s Gemini AI With a Poisoned Calendar Invite to Take Over a Smart Home
item.description: For likely the first time ever, security researchers have shown how AI can be hacked to create real world havoc, allowing them to turn off lights, open smart shutters, and more.

item.title: Hackers Hijacked Google’s Gemini AI With a Poisoned Calendar Invite to Take Over a Smart Home
item.description: For likely the first time ever, security researchers have shown how AI can be hacked to create real world havoc, allowing them to turn off lights, open smart shutters, and more.

item.title: Google releases Gemini 2.5 Deep Think for AI Ultra subscribers
